title: Paul Hollywood's ex Summer calls her family the 'Kent Kardashians' after lavish trip
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Paul Hollywood's ex Summer Monteys-Fullam has compared her family to Kim Kardashian and Ko after they jetted back from a plush holiday this afternoon.

The barmaid, 24, has been spamming her Instagram account with photos from her sun-kissed trip to Cyprus, which she went on with her glam mum Sabina, her sisters and dad.

She filmed as her Ryanair flight landed back in the UK, captioning the post: "The Kent Kardashians are back."

Her comment was clearly meant to be tongue in cheek as she posted two cry laughing emojis alongside it.

Summer's post was clearly in response to a recent story that she wants to turn her family into the British Kardashians.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Friends say Summer’s life coach mother Sabina, 48, is behind the move.

“She sees herself as a Kris Jenner figure,” said one source, comparing Sabina to the self-styled mom-ager of the Kardashian dynasty, which includes daughters Kim, Khloe, Kourtney, Kylie and Kendall.

Sabina and Summer’s elder sister Saskia, 26, have been advising Summer on her new path.

(Image: Instagram)

“Sabina is steering Summer to stardom,” said the source. “Their nickname from friends, mainly towards the mum, eldest daughter Saskia and Summer are the Kent Kardashians.

“Sabina is now focussing on Summer and sees herself as a guide and a mentor to her achieving fame.”

Summer enjoyed a two year romance with Paul, who is 30 years her senior, that came to a grinding halt in August.

(Image: Instagram)

It was reported that Paul had wanted Summer to sign a non-disclosure agreement and her refusal to comply was the final nail in the coffin for their age gap love.

Since then Summer has been - in her own words - 'taking every opportunity she can' to further a career in the showbiz spotlight.

She had been linked to I'm A Celebrity but shot down the rumours last month saying producers hadn't even approached her.
description: The barmaid, 24, has been spamming her Instagram account with photos from her sun-kissed family holiday in Cyprus
